author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a major breakthrough, the district police have arrested a four-member gang of house breakers and recovered from them 102 sovereigns of gold jewellery and 280 grams of silver articles.

After mounting technical surveillance, a special team led by K Maheswari, Deputy Superintendent of Police (DSP), Kilakarai, arrested the four accused who had been stealing gold jewellery after targeting locked houses during day time.

Superintendent of Police N. Manivannan, who displayed the recovered silver articles and gold jewellery here on Friday, congratulated the DSP and her team members for their commendable work.

After the Paramakudi police arrested some accused last month and recovered more than 100 sovereigns of jewellery, the Kilakarai team has made a breakthrough, the SP said adding “we have cracked almost all theft cases in the district and recovered stolen properties.”

Ms. Maheswari said S. Mohamed Thaslim (34) of Erwadi, headed the gang and acted as kingpin. He would take one of his three accomplices to break open locked houses during day time, she said. Police also seized specially made device to break open doors and latches, a television set, a laptop and a two wheeler, the DSP said.

Thaslim and K. Shajahan, running a mobile shop in Erwadi were arrested on Tuesday and remanded in judicial custody, while two other accused, identified as M. Ismail, a native of Tiruchi and S. Saravanan from Madurai were arrested on Friday and remanded in judicial custody, police said.

Thaslim, who took the lion’s share after selling the stolen jewellery had bought lands and the police have launched a dragnet for his accomplice who helped him in the land dealings, police said.

He faced more than 60 cases, including a murder for gain case. He was also booked under Arms act for threatening shop keepers with a pistol, police said. Saravanan, who had murdered his wife in Kerala after suspecting her fidelity also faced over half a dozen cases, police said.
title: Four-member gang busted; 102 sovereigns of gold recovered
